Thank you for visiting my website!

My name is Jinyoung Hur (but you can also call me Jina), and I am a Ph.D. student at the Computer Science Department at the Universtiy of Illinois Urbana-Champaign. My research interests are in computing education for non-major students, individuals with disabilities, and computing education policy.

If you would also like to learn about my brilliant colleagues work, please visit [TRAILS Lab](https://trailslab.web.illinois.edu/)!
